question: Mahesh Kanodia, who recently passed away, is a famous musician and former MP from which state?
explanation:
Former Member of Parliament and legendary Gujarati singer-musician Mahesh Kanodia has recently passed away at the age of 83.
Mahesh Kanodia was an MP from Patan Lok Sabha constituency. He is the brother of legendary Gujarati film star Naresh Kanodia and the they are known as the Mahesh-Naresh duo in Gujarati film industry.
